item.description:
$25 until June 12th
$30 from June 13th-July 6th
$35 July 7th-race day

Parking is at the University of Connecticut parking lot located on Troutbrook Drive, West Hartford. No parking is available at Elizabeth Park. Free shuttle service between the parking area and Elizabeth Park will be available. The last shuttle departs from the park at 10:30 a.m.

From I-84 East or West, take Exit 43 (West Hartford). Right at traffic light at end of ramp. First left at light onto Troutbrook Drive. After 4th light, take a right into the University of Connecticut parking lot. Walk to registration area at corner of Troutbrook/Asylum.

Red Dress Run
item.how_to_find_us: I would suggest we meet up at the Free Shuttle parking and ride the nifty school bus together :)
item.name: Red Dress Run for Women
